The war file is included in the attachment.

Steps to recreate.
1. Deploy the war file.
2. Type http://localhost:9090/SimpleTagTest/index.jsp in the browser
(Please note: The port # in my case is 9090, and not 8080)
3. Hit "Submit Query Button".

Created an attachment (id=82046)
The war file

This morning, I copied the two jar files; jstl.jar and standard.jar in /ContextRoot/WebContent/WEB-INF/lib, and it works. 
Apparently, the problem is eclipse sometimes fail to find the appropriate classes from jars in the Library.
I don't know which Library you're referring to, but the JasperExceptions indicate problems in the server, not in the IDE code (unless the .jar files were supposed to be in the war but weren't).
